data.lyric:
[ti:Rockin' Around the Christmas Tree]
[ar:Brenda Lee]
[al:NOW That's What I Call Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:07.59]Rocking around the Christmas tree
[00:10.55]At the Christmas party hop
[00:13.18]
[00:14.30]Mistletoe hung where you can see
[00:17.12]Every couple tries to stop
[00:19.43]
[00:20.80]Rocking around the Christmas tree
[00:23.68]Let the Christmas spirit ring
[00:26.05]
[00:27.43]Later we'll have some pumpkin pie
[00:30.80]And we'll do some caroling
[00:32.86]
[00:34.24]You will get a sentimental
[00:37.24]Feeling when you hear
[00:39.86]
[00:41.23]Voices singing let's be jolly
[00:44.05]Deck the halls with boughs of holly
[00:47.86]Rocking around the Christmas tree
[00:50.86]Have a happy holiday
[00:53.36]
[00:54.67]Everyone's dancing merrily
[00:57.42]In the new old-fashioned way
[01:00.05]
[01:28.55]You will get a sentimental
[01:30.99]
[01:31.56]Feeling when you hear
[01:34.12]
[01:35.06]Voices singing let's be jolly
[01:38.37]Deck the halls with boughs of holly
[01:42.00]Rocking around the Christmas tree
[01:44.87]Have a happy holiday
[01:47.75]
[01:48.62]Everyone's dancing merrily
[01:51.81]In the new old-fashioned way
data.trans:
[ti:Rockin' Around the Christmas Tree]
[ar:Brenda Lee]
[al:NOW That's What I Call Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:07.59]绕着圣诞树摇摆
[00:10.55]在圣诞晚会上跳舞
[00:13.18]
[00:14.30]槲寄生挂在那里你可以看到
[00:17.12]每对夫妇都试图停下
[00:19.43]
[00:20.80]绕着圣诞树摇摆
[00:23.68]让圣诞精神回响
[00:26.05]
[00:27.43]稍后我们会有一些南瓜饼
[00:30.80]我们会唱一些圣诞颂歌
[00:32.86]
[00:34.24]你会变得很伤感
[00:37.24]当你听到那些颂歌
[00:39.86]
[00:41.23]大声歌唱让我们快乐
[00:44.05]冬青枝铺满地板
[00:47.86]绕着圣诞树摇摆
[00:50.86]有一个快乐的假期
[00:53.36]
[00:54.67]每个人愉快地跳舞
[00:57.42]跳着传统的舞蹈
[01:00.05]
[01:28.55]你会变得很伤感
[01:30.99]
[01:31.56]当你听到那些颂歌
[01:34.12]
[01:35.06]大声歌唱让我们快乐
[01:38.37]冬青枝铺满地板
[01:42.00]绕着圣诞树摇摆
[01:44.87]有一个快乐的假期
[01:47.75]
[01:48.62]每个人愉快地跳舞
[01:51.81]跳着传统的舞蹈
